thread.title: Antje Göpfert

author: Antje Göpfert
title: Antje Göpfert
text: Our stay was just fabulous. Our dog was just a happy little fellow and the place we stayed in was very exceptional. The owner left for their overseas travel and only wanted us to be happy in their home. The contract was good to have, all needed paperwork was there and if we had questions we could easily contact the owner per wahtsApp. Our neighbours' were really caring and made sure we were happy. Love this site a lot, awesome people, places and pets!
